welcome_account_coldwallet_content: A cold wallet cannot verify the validity of the account name used. Please ensure it is correct or transactions may not be able to be signed.
welcome_account_lookup_content: If you enter a public key, a lookup will be performed to find associated accounts.
welcome_account_lookup_fail_content: The account name or public key could not be found.
welcome_account_select_content: Choose an account from the dropdown above.
welcome_instructions_1: To get started, Sqrl needs to connect to a EOSIO API node.
welcome_instructions_2: Enter the node you'd like to connect to.
welcome_instructions_3: Enter the public key or account name.
welcome_instructions_3_cold: Enter the account name to use.
welcome_instructions_4: Select one of the matching accounts using the dropdown.
welcome_instructions_5: Enter the private key (wif) for this account.
welcome_instructions_5a: Enter the private ACTIVE key (wif) for this account (OWNER key not accepted).
welcome_instructions_6: Choose whether to encrypt and save a local wallet or continue using temporary access.
welcome_instructions_7: Do you already have an account or need to create one?
welcome_instructions_sign_tx: Use this wallet to sign transactions?
welcome_key_coldwallet_content: A cold wallet cannot verify if the private key provided is matching the account.
welcome_key_compare_content: All EOSIO keys start with the number 5 and are 51 characters long.
welcome_key_compare_expecting_match_to: Expecting a private key that matches one of the below keys.
welcome_key_compare_fail_invalid_content: The private key you entered cannot be converted to a public key.
welcome_key_compare_fail_match_content: The private key you entered yields the following public key which does not match the expected key above.
welcome_key_compare_matches_title: The private key entered matches the public key on the accounts permissions.
welcome_key_compare_placeholder: Begins with the number 5 and is 51 characters long
welcome_key_watchwallet_content: By setting up a watch wallet - transactions will only be created/saved and not signed by this wallet.
welcome_more_servers_1: Not sure what server to use?
welcome_more_servers_2: Click here to view a list of options.
welcome_path_generate_keys_subheader: Generate an account creation request and allow Sqrl to automatically try creating an account for you.
welcome_path_have_account_subheader: Already have an account name and private key?
welcome_server_connection_fail_content: Try again or enter a different server.
welcome_ssl_warning_confirm: I understand the risks - connect anyways.
welcome_ssl_warning_content: Using a non-HTTPS API may risk your privacy.
